archimate:ApplicationService.name: Revocation Registry
archimate:ApplicationService.documentation: An online repository of data needed for Revocation. In Sovrin Infrastructure, a Revocation Registry is a privacy-respecting cryptographic data structure maintained on the Sovrin Ledger by an Issuer in order to support Revocation of a Credential. See Transaction Type.
